messages.subject: low self esteem?was balance
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/19/02 1:12:36 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/19/02 1:12:36 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< I don't
recall people here talk about hitting or anything of the sort, >>

Stick around, that topic will surface again most likely. The last time
people were getting riled up, it was the spanking debate.
These topics come up over and over as new people join.....and interestingly
enough, some leave when people won't change their opinions on spanking for
them, nor stop questioning. But other people's lives are changed.
I think some people post very bluntly, that does not equal an attack in any
way.
Other people, like yourself, will post more gently.
That's ok.
Everyone should quit worrying about how other people post and just post in
the style they feel is best.

Ren
"Knowledge will not always take the place of simple observation."
~Arnold Lobel
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
